name: Match-3-Asteroids
description:
I made this game in under 48h for Mix And GameJame. It was my first Game Jame, so there are some small bugs, but the game is playable.
Your goal is to shoot 3 asteroids in the same size in a row to destroy them.

Controls :

-A, D turn ship

-W acceleration

-spacebar - Fire, and restart

If you have any comments, please feel free to share it with me.
